author: Sam Baker
title: What the U.S. can learn from other countries in the coronavirus fight
description: Data: The Center for Systems Science and Engineering at Johns Hopkins; Note: Cases are shown on a logarithmic scale; Chart: Naema Ahmed/Axios The countries that have most successfully fended off the novel coronavirus have mainly done it with a combination of …
content:
The countries that have most successfully fended off the novel coronavirus have mainly done it with a combination of new technology and old-school principles.
Why it matters: There's a lot the U.S. can learn from the way other countries have handled this glo… [+4862 chars]
